name: Alchemy Mastery 1
description: Potions and poisons you make are 20% stronger.

name: Alchemy Mastery 2
description: Potions and poisons you make are 40% stronger.

name: Physician
description: You may choose a type of beneficial potion: Health, Magicka or Stamina. Potions you mix that restore or fortify the chosen attribute are 50% stronger.

name: Stimulants
description: When you use a beneficial potion or ingredient, you regenerate 2% of your Magicka and Stamina per second for 30 seconds.

name: Advanced Lab
description: You may choose to upgrade one alchemy lab to an Advanced version for 2500 gold. Potions you mix are 25% stronger at an Advanced Lab. Can be 'Disassembled' by sneaking, allowing you to upgrade another.

name: Experimenter
description: Eating an ingredient reveals all effects.

name: Poisoner
description: Poisons you mix are 1% more powerful per level of Alchemy.

name: Bottomless Cup
description: Poisons applied to weapons last for one additional hit per 10 levels of Alchemy.

name: Crimson Haze
description: Stimulants also increases movement speed by 10% for its duration.

name: Elemental Oil
description: You may choose a power: 'Fire Oil', 'Frost Oil' or 'Shock Oil'. At will, create a pool of oil that lasts 20 seconds. It reacts violently when struck by a projectile or explosion, exploding and dealing damage equal to your Alchemy skill level.

name: Alkahest
description: Your poisons are highly corrosive, enabling you to ignore 40% of the armor rating of an affected target for their duration.

name: Lab Skeever
description: For 20 seconds after using any alchemy lab, beneficial potions you drink last 15 times longer and are 25% stronger.

name: Green Thumb
description: Twice as many ingredients are gathered from most harvestable objects.

name: Maenad
description: Magicka and Stamina are increased by 50 points when you are under the effect of a beneficial potion or ingredient, but reduced by 25 points when you are not.

name: The Alchemist's Cookbook
description: You may choose a second Elemental Oil power. In addition to 'Fire Oil', 'Frost Oil' and 'Shock Oil', you may also choose 'Calming Oil', 'Frenzy Oil', 'Paralysis Oil' or 'Hallowed Oil'.

name: Double Toil and Trouble
description: You mix twice as many potions at your Advanced Lab.

name: Pure Mixture
description: All negative effects are removed from created potions, and all positive effects are removed from created poisons.

name: Amplify Lethality
description: Grants the 'Amplify Lethality' power. Once a day, point at a victim to silently reduce their poison resistance by 250% for 10 seconds.

name: Witchmaster
description: When you use a beneficial potion or ingredient, 50% chance to receive a powerful side effect, randomly chosen from a range of 40 side effects.

name: Chymical Wedding
description: Witchmaster side effects have 50% chance to cause side effects themselves.

name: Walking Disaster
description: In combat, periodically spill a random oil puddle on the ground. Puddles last 60 seconds.

name: World Serpent
description: When you shout, your blood turns poisonous for 15 seconds. The next time you get hit with a weapon, retaliate with a powerful poisonous strike that deals 50 points of poison damage per second for 10 seconds.

name: That Which Does Not Kill Youâ€¦
description: Upon learning this perk, you imbibe a deadly toxin, taking 150 damage per second. If you survive for 60 seconds, you receive 3 perk points and a permanent 25% bonus to all potions and poisons you make.

name: Alteration Mastery 1
description: Cast Alteration spells for 35% less Magicka, and Alteration spells last 0.5% longer per level of Alteration.

name: Alteration Mastery 2
description: Cast Alteration spells for 50% less Magicka, and Alteration spells last 1% longer per level of Alteration.

name: Alteration Dual Casting
description: Dual casting an Alteration spell empowers it, increasing effectiveness and cost.

name: Mage Armor 1
description: Protection spells like Stoneflesh are 100% stronger if not wearing armor.

name: Mage Armor 2
description: Protection spells like Stoneflesh are 150% stronger if not wearing armor.

name: Mage Armor 3
description: Protection spells like Stoneflesh are 200% stronger if not wearing armor.

name: Geomancer
description: If wearing robes and no light or heavy armor, you take 30% less damage from attacks while charging or concentrating on a spell.

name: Philosopher's Stone
description: Once a day, generates gold equal to four times your Alteration skill level.

name: Vancian Magic
description: Cast magic like the wizards of old. Your next 20 spells do not use Magicka and are twice as effective. When you run out of spells, you are unable to cast spells until you rest by sleeping at an inn or in your home.

name: Wild Shrines
description: Five shrines dedicated to nature's mysteries can be found in Skyrim. Each shrine grants a permanent bonus to one school of magic, making all spells from that school 15% more powerful or last 30% longer.

name: Alter Self: Resistances
description: You may choose two resistances to increase by 25%.

name: Distorted Shape
description: When you gain an armor spell in combat (or enter combat with an active armor spell), you become intangible and unable to be affected by spells or attacks for 10 seconds or until you perform an offensive or defensive action.

name: Spellblade
description: Whenever you cast a spell with one hand, you deal 20% more attack damage for 4 seconds.

name: Command Lock
description: Once every 6 ingame hours, you can weaken an Expert or lower lock, reducing its difficulty to zero.

name: Energy Shield
description: If wearing robes and no light or heavy armor, reduces incoming attack and elemental damage by 35% but you lose Magicka equal to the amount of Health lost. The damage reduction gradually diminishes as Magicka falls below half. The energy shield is disabled when your hands are lowered.

name: Intuitive Magic 1
description: Novice/ and apprentice spells of any school cost 100% less Magicka to cast.

name: Intuitive Magic 2
description: Novice/ and apprentice spells of any school cost 100% less Magicka to cast.

name: Quadratic Wizard
description: Whenever you recharge your Vancian Magic spells, you gain 1 additional Vancian Magic spell for each 10 points of base Magicka.

name: Alter Self: Attributes
description: You may choose an attribute (Health, Magicka, Stamina) to increase by 50 points.

name: Home Mythal
description: Summons a permanent magical field at the location where you learn this perk. Alteration spells gain x2 duration if cast within 5000 feet, and x20 duration if cast within 250 feet. Additionally, Vancian Magic can be recharged by sleeping within 250 feet.

name: Welloc's Dormant Arcana
description: Choose a spell type (Armor, Cloak, Conjure Daedra, Conjure Undead, Invisibility) and 3 magic effects (Fortify, Regenerate, Waterwalking, ...). The chosen magic effects will activate when you are affected by the chosen spell type.

name: Dungeon Master
description: Whenever you recharge your Vancian Magic spells, you may choose less or more spells in exchange for increased or decreased spell effectiveness, and/or choose one of three metamagic enhancements. Your choice remains in effect until your next rest.

name: Energy Roil
description: Whenever you cast a spell with one hand, reduces the armor of nearby enemies within 10 feet by 150 points for 4 seconds.

name: The Monarch
description: You cannot regenerate Magicka and lose 10 points of Magicka per second but absorb 25 points of Magicka per second from living creatures within 20 feet, whether friend or foe.

name: Aurification
description: Once every 12 ingame hours, activate a paralyzed target below half Health to transmute its body into gold worth 100 times its level, killing the target. Has a 50% chance of creating gold ore. No effect on essential targets.

name: Dimension Door
description: Grants the 'Dimension Door' power. At will, creates a magical doorway that teleports you to the location of your Home Mythal.

name: Throne of Nirn
description: Standing still for 5 seconds while holding a spell summons a pillar of earth under your feet that carries you into the air and out of melee range. While standing on the pillar, your spells are 20% more powerful or last 40% longer. This effect is disabled when your hands are lowered.

name: Emergency Teleport
description: When you fall below 15% Health due to combat damage, you briefly turn invulnerable and teleport back to the location where you entered combat.

name: Nullifier
description: You radiate a dampening field, preventing enemies within 25 feet from regenerating Magicka and Stamina.

name: Rend Resistances
description: Whenever you attack with a weapon, reduces the magic resistance of nearby enemies within 10 feet by 15% for 4 seconds.

name: Arcane Thesis
description: Grants the 'Arcane Thesis' power: use it to master the spell you are dual casting. A mastered spell is 20% more powerful or lasts 40% longer. Only one spell can be mastered.

name: Archery Mastery 1
description: Bows and crossbows deal 25% more damage, and critical strikes with bows and crossbows do 2% more critical damage per level of Archery.

name: Archery Mastery 2
description: Bows and crossbows deal 50% more damage, and critical strikes with bows and crossbows do 2% more critical damage per level of Archery.

name: Clean Kill
description: Bows and crossbows deal 20% more damage to a target at full Health.

name: Wingstrike 1
description: Bashing with a bow or crossbow always staggers the target. Bows and crossbows deal 20% more damage to that target for 10 seconds.

name: Wingstrike 2
description: Bashing with a bow or crossbow always staggers the target. Bows and crossbows deal 40% more damage to that target for 10 seconds.

name: Long Shot 1
description: Bows and crossbows deal up to 40% more damage to targets beyond 50 feet. The damage bonus increases as distance increases.

name: Long Shot 2
description: Bows and crossbows deal up to 60% more damage to targets beyond 50 feet. The damage bonus increases as distance increases.

name: Long Shot 3
description: Bows and crossbows deal up to 80% more damage to targets beyond 50 feet. The damage bonus increases as distance increases.

name: Steady Hand 1
description: Pressing Block while aiming will zoom in your view/ and slow time by 25%.

name: Steady Hand 2
description: Pressing Block while aiming will zoom in your view/ and slow time by 50%.

name: Crippling Shot
description: Arrows and bolts slow a target within 25 feet by 10% for 20 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Hunter's Discipline
description: Recover twice as many arrows and bolts from dead bodies.

name: Thread the Needle 1
description: Bows and crossbows ignore 25% armor if the target is not moving.

name: Thread the Needle 2
description: Bows and crossbows ignore 50% armor if the target is not moving.

name: Pinning Shot
description: Arrows and bolts have a chance to stagger a target within 50 feet. More effective against targets with a lower remaining Health percentage. No effect on massive targets.

name: Ranger
description: Can move at full speed with a drawn bow.

name: Focus on the Prey
description: Cannot be staggered while holding a drawn bow or reloading a crossbow.

name: Quick Shot
description: Can draw a bow or reload a crossbow 30% faster.

name: Snipe
description: Shooting targets you haven't shot within the past 10 seconds inflicts a critical strike that deals three times critical damage, and any weapon enchantments applied by the shot are twice as effective.

name: Ambush Predator
description: After standing still for 6 seconds with a bow or crossbow out, it does 25% more damage until you move.

name: Beak and Talon
description: Your shots disrupt targets within 25 feet, disarming them if they are power attacking and knocking them down if they are staggered.

name: Hailstorm
description: Attack 8% faster with bows and crossbows for 10 seconds after shooting a fully drawn bow or crossbow in combat. This effect stacks.

name: Hawkeye
description: Grants the 'Hawkeye' power. Once a day, slow time and focus on your foes for 10 seconds, looking for opportunities for a killing shot. Finding their vulnerability takes 1 second per 125 Health. Once you do, you may shoot them for an instant kill.

name: Trick Arrows
description: Able to upgrade many types of arrows at a forge or anvil, adding a bonus effect (Force, Immolation, Freezing, Grounding, Maze or Death) based on its material.

name: Hunt Together
description: When fighting only one enemy, hitting the target with a bow or crossbow manifests a Spirit Wolf for 30 seconds. The wolf deals damage equal to 15% of your current Stamina. This effect has a 30 second cooldown per target.

name: Lion's Arrow
description: Grants the 'Lion's Arrow' power: use it to store the spell you are dual casting. Shooting a fully drawn bow in combat also releases the stored spell in the direction of the crosshair. Only works with spells that affect other targets.

name: Three Crows
description: Shooting a target beyond 25 feet three times in rapid succession, leaving less than 2.75 seconds between each hit, deals bonus damage equal to 15% of the target's current Health (max. 150 damage) and knocks the target to the ground.

name: Perfect Aim
description: Bows deal 25% more damage if the shot strikes a target within 2 seconds after the bow is fully drawn. Crossbows deal triple damage to targets with 20% or less Health remaining.

name: Block Mastery 1
description: Block 10% more damage.

name: Block Mastery 2
description: Block 20% more damage.

name: Timed Block 1
description: Assume a defensive position for 1 second after raising your shield or weapon, blocking 30% more damage and staggering attackers in melee range. (If you do not block an attack during this time, you cannot attempt another Timed Block for 2 seconds/1 second.)

name: Timed Block 2
description: Assume a defensive position for 1 second after raising your shield or weapon, blocking 30% more damage and staggering attackers in melee range. (If you do not block an attack during this time, you cannot attempt another Timed Block for 2 seconds/1 second.)

name: Deflect Arrows
description: While blocking with a shield or weapon, arrows do half damage. Arrows that hit the shield do no damage.

name: Poke the Dragon
description: After a successful Timed Block within 8 feet, you may retaliate with increased strength, increasing your attack damage and critical strike damage against the attacker by 25% for 5 seconds.

name: Apocalypse Proof 1
description: Perform a Timed Block to mitigate incoming fire, frost and shock spells and effects, reducing their damage by 50%/to zero.

name: Apocalypse Proof 2
description: Perform a Timed Block to mitigate incoming fire, frost and shock spells and effects, reducing their damage by 50%/to zero.

name: Power Bash
description: Able to do a power bash by holding down Attack while blocking.

name: Quick Reflexes
description: Time slows down if you are blocking during an enemy's power attack.

name: Dominion
description: Take 25% less attack damage from any direction when blocking in combat.

name: Skull Rattler
description: Bashing deals 3% more damage per point of Stamina.

name: Dragon Tail
description: After a successful Timed Block, bashing the attacker within 5 seconds deals double damage.

name: Timing Streak
description: Performing 3 successful Timed Blocks in a row completes a Timing Streak, restoring 75 points of Stamina. (Taking an unblocked attack or blocking an attack outside the timed block window breaks the combo.)

name: Block Runner
description: Can move at full speed while blocking.

name: Mocking Blow
description: Power bashing with a weapon infuriates living targets for 30 seconds. They won't flee from combat but can't regenerate Stamina, lose 15 points of Stamina per second and you take no damage from their attacks during a Timed Block.

name: Break Their Teeth
description: Completing a Timing Streak violently disarms the last attacker, staggering all within an 8 foot radius.

name: Cast Aside
description: Interrupting an attack with a power bash with a shield knocks the attacker to the ground. Targets can only be affected once every 30 seconds.

name: Deliverance
description: Completing a Timing Streak grants 10% extra attack damage for 90 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Hold the Line
description: During a Timed Block, allies within 10 feet gain 250 points of armor rating.

name: Unstoppable Force
description: Able to sprint with a shield raised. This knocks enemies in your path to the ground, but costs 10 points of Stamina per second. Enemies can only be affected once every 10 seconds.

name: Dragon Scales
description: You take no damage from attacks during a Timed Block as long as you have Stamina remaining.

name: Conjuration Mastery 1
description: Cast Conjuration spells for 35% less Magicka, and Conjuration spells last 0.5% longer per level of Conjuration.

name: Conjuration Mastery 2
description: Cast Conjuration spells for 50% less Magicka, and Conjuration spells last 1% longer per level of Conjuration.

name: Bone Collector
description: Find 11 types of bones on humanoid corpses. 4 Bone Altars are marked on the map. At a Bone Altar, convert 1 of each bone into a Skeleton Warrior. Skeletons do not count against your summon limit. Enemies can only temporarily defeat them, not destroy them.

name: Conjuration Dual Casting
description: Dual casting a Conjuration spell empowers it, increasing effectiveness and cost.

name: Mystic Binding
description: Bound Weapon spells now summon Mystic Weapons which deal more damage.

name: Dead Tide 1
description: Maximum number of Skeletons increased by 1 for each 75 points of base Magicka.

name: Dead Tide 2
description: Maximum number of Skeletons increased by 1 for each 50 points of base Magicka.

name: Planemeld
description: Able to summon Daedra and other non-undead minions five times farther away.

name: Ravenous Dead
description: Reanimated minions receive a brief burst of strength, dealing 200% extra attack damage for 15 seconds after being reanimated. The level cap of reanimation spells and effects is increased by 1% per level of Conjuration.

name: Soul Raider
description: Bound weapons cast Soul Trap on targets for 5 seconds. After trapping 250 souls, all bound weapon perks last twice as long.

name: Atromancy
description: Summoned Daedra and other non-undead minions last three times as long (or five times at night).

name: Barrow Lord
description: You may give commands to all Skeletons within 150 feet at once, instead of one at a time. Skeletons take 25% less damage from attacks.

name: Preservation
description: Summoned and reanimated undead last three times as long (or twenty times if you place Hagraven Feathers into their inventory or use the Dread Zombie or Dead Thrall spells). Reanimated undead also gain 500 armor for 60 seconds after being reanimated.

name: Rat King
description: When entering combat, creates 3 undead Skeevers under your control. Their corpses can be raised, but they dissipate when combat ends. Use the 'Merciful King' power to temporarily prevent this ability from activating.

name: Reap and Sow 1
description: You loot 60% more bones from corpses and recover 50% more bones when you destroy a created Skeleton. Created Skeletons last 75% longer.

name: Reap and Sow 2
description: You loot 100% more bones from corpses and recover all bones when you destroy a created Skeleton. Created Skeletons last 200% longer.

name: Rend From This World
description: Bound weapons banish conjured Daedra, turn reanimated undead and deal 100 extra damage to non-conjured Daedra.

name: Signed in Blood
description: When a friendly conjured Daedra within 15 feet is below full Health, it absorbs your lifeforce to heal itself, preventing you from regenerating Health but regenerating 10 points per second (increased by 4% of its maximum Health when out of combat).

name: Edge of Oblivion
description: You can summon or reanimate 1 additional minion and they last 50% longer. When you do not command a summon or reanimated minion, you lose 250 points of armor and 50% magic resistance.

name: Pact Magic
description: Destruction spells and effects are 10% more effective for each friendly conjured Daedra within 30 feet.

name: Skeleton Mages 1
description: Able to create Skeleton Mages (Fire, Frost, Shock) at a Bone Altar. /You may choose their element at the time of creation.

name: Skeleton Mages 2
description: Able to create Skeleton Mages (Poison, Drain Armor, Stagger) at a Bone Altar. /You may choose their element at the time of creation.

name: Undead Crown
description: Restores 10 points of Health and Magicka per second to summoned or reanimated undead within 15 feet.

name: Void Burn
description: Bound weapons brand victims with unholy energy for 5 seconds, halting Magicka and Stamina regeneration while draining 15 points per second. When both are depleted, the energy starts devouring their flesh, dealing 15 points of magic damage per second.

name: A Plague Upon Thee
description: If a reanimated undead is destroyed within 20 seconds, the attacker is stricken with a Daedric disease that deals 40 damage per second for 20 seconds. Those who have this perk are immune.

name: Conjure Altar
description: Grants the 'Conjure Altar' power. At will, summons a Bone Altar for 60 seconds.

name: Fire Ritual
description: Able to ritually burn 1 of each bone at a Bone Altar, strengthening all Skeletons within 150 feet. Lasts until the Skeleton is destroyed and increases weapon damage by 15%, spell damage by 30% and Health by 50 points. This effect stacks.

name: Hollow Binding
description: Bound weapons cut through flesh and spirit, reducing magic resistance by 30% for 5 seconds.

name: Maelstrom
description: While you charge or concentrate on a spell, friendly conjured Daedra within 30 feet gain 30% extra attack damage.

name: Corpse Gas
description: If your reanimated undead is destroyed while on fire within 30 seconds, it explodes, dealing up to 300 points of fire damage to targets without this perk. You deal five times as much fire damage to your reanimated undead.

name: Dark Whispers
description: Bound weapons induce a battle rage in their wielder, granting 20% extra attack damage and 100 points of armor rating for 5 seconds when a target is struck.

name: Elemental Potency
description: Atronach conjurations now call Potent Atronachs that are higher level and more powerful.

name: Brand of the Necromancer
description: Brand a corpse by striking it with a bound weapon or by delivering the killing blow with a bound weapon attack. The brand grants 25% attack damage and 100 points of Health when reanimated or resurrected. Undead and automatons cannot be branded.

name: Feed the Monster
description: Able to feed Human Flesh to summoned or reanimated creatures, healing them and increasing Health, Magicka and Stamina by 200 points for 600 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Necromaster
description: Grants finer control over creatures reanimated with powerful reanimation spells (Dread Zombie, Dead Thrall). Able to manipulate their inventory and equip items (if they are humanoid) and they emit a glow when slain that can be seen through walls. The level cap of those spells is also increased by 100%.

name: Unleash Hell
description: Conjured Daedra within 75 feet gain additional spells on a 30 second cooldown (Flame Atronach: fire explosion. Frost Atronach: reduced armor/magic resistance curse. Storm Atronach: magnetic knockdown. Dremora: increased attack damage and movement speed).

name: Covenant of Coldharbour
description: Hollow Binding reduces magic resistance by an additional 30% if you control a summoned Daedra or other non-undead minion.

name: Puppet Master
description: Your created Skeletons take 25% less damage when you are blocking, deal 25% more attack damage when you are attacking, and their spells are 25% more powerful when you are casting a spell.

name: Shocked to Life
description: If your reanimated minion is struck by a shock spell within 30 seconds after reanimation completes, it attacks 250% faster and moves 50% faster for 10 seconds. You deal no damage to your reanimated minions with shock spells.

name: Summon Resist
description: Friendly conjured Daedra and other non-undead minions within 75 feet gain 50% magic resistance and 300 points of armor.

name: King of Bones
description: Assume Control of a Skeleton while becoming invulnerable. The Skeleton does quadruple damage and takes half damage. Unless commanded to remain passive, it automatically attacks foes in range. Lasts up to 45 seconds.

name: March of Oblivion
description: You can summon or reanimate 1 additional minion per 250 points of base Magicka, up to 3 additional minions.

name: Destruction Mastery 1
description: Destruction spells cost 35% less Magicka, and Destruction spells are 0.25% more powerful per level of Destruction.

name: Destruction Mastery 2
description: Destruction spells cost 50% less Magicka, and Destruction spells are 0.5% more powerful per level of Destruction.

name: Combustion 1
description: Fire spells and effects cast on others are up to 20% more powerful, based on the target's missing Health percentage.

name: Combustion 2
description: Fire spells and effects cast on others are up to 30% more powerful, based on the target's missing Health percentage.

name: Destruction Dual Casting
description: Dual casting a Destruction spell empowers it, increasing effectiveness and cost.

name: Ionized Path 1
description: Shock spells and effects cast on others are up to 20% more powerful, based on the target's missing Magicka percentage.

name: Ionized Path 2
description: Shock spells and effects cast on others are up to 30% more powerful, based on the target's missing Magicka percentage.

name: Merciless Cold 1
description: Frost spells and effects cast on others are up to 20% more powerful, based on the target's missing Stamina percentage.

name: Merciless Cold 2
description: Frost spells and effects cast on others are up to 30% more powerful, based on the target's missing Stamina percentage.

name: Force of Nature
description: Elemental spells and effects cost 30% less Magicka to cast in favorable weather: fire spells in sunlight, frost spells during snowfall, shock spells in the rain.

name: Frostfall
description: Frost spells reduce the attack damage of their targets by 25% for 5 seconds.

name: Scarring Burns
description: Fire spells reduce the fire resistance of their targets by 20% for 5 seconds.

name: Static Field
description: Shock spells that would leave their target above 75% Health deal enough additional damage to make up the difference.

name: Arc Burn
description: Shock spells hitting targets that are not fire resistant cause a plasma that deals 5 points of unresistable fire damage per second for 4 seconds.

name: Conflagration
description: Fire spells ignite the ground underneath their targets for 30 seconds. The burning ground deals 8 points of damage per second for 3 seconds on contact.

name: Crystalize
description: Frost spells freeze the blood of their targets, halting Stamina regeneration for 5 seconds. If the targets are not resistant to frost, frost spells also reduce armor by 125 points for 5 seconds.

name: Harsh Lesson
description: Destruction projectile spells interrupt targets that are casting a spell. Does not work on massive targets.

name: Runecaster
description: Can place runes 75 feet farther away, and place three times as many runes at a time.

name: Flash Fire
description: Fire spells have 15% chance to ignite the target for 2 seconds. The next instance of fire damage that hits an ignited target (except burning ground) detonates, dealing 100% more damage and causing a living target to flee the flames for 4 seconds.

name: Magnetize
description: Shock spells have 15% chance to lift the target into the air for 2 seconds, preventing movement.

name: Robe of the Magi
description: If wearing robes and no light or heavy armor, Destruction spells are 30% more powerful.

name: Shatter
description: Frost spells that hit a frost resistant target fragment and explode in a 15 foot area, reducing frost resistance by 25% for 10 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Iced Earth
description: Dual casting frost spells freezes the earth under your feet. The frozen ground deals 40 points of damage per second to Health and Stamina for 4 seconds on contact. Frost spells and effects are 50% more powerful against affected targets.

name: Nova Charge
description: Dual casting 6 shock spells in combat triggers a shock nova that deals 200 points of shock damage to nearby enemies and staggers them. This can only occur once per battle.

name: Pyromancer Ascension
description: Dual casting 6 fire spells in combat unleashes your power for 20 seconds: fire spells and effects are 50% more powerful and cost half Magicka, and you leave burning ground in your wake that deals 30 damage per second. This can only occur once per battle.

name: Ancient Seals
description: Destruction runes no longer deal instant damage, but inflict a stacking 10 second elemental burn that deals 15% damage per second.

name: Electroconvulsions
description: Shock spells incapacitate living targets below 25% Health if they are not shock resistant.

name: Hypothermia
description: Frost spells paralyze living targets below 25% Health if they are not frost resistant.

name: Scorched Earth
description: Fire spells (except concentration spells) burn corpses to cinders, creating a pyre that burns for 30 seconds. The burning ground deals 50 points of damage per second for 5 seconds on contact.

name: War of the Elements
description: You deal 40% more attack damage to targets that are taking damage from the burning ground created by Conflagration, Scorched Earth or Pyromancer Ascension or are being affected by Electroconvulsions or Hypothermia.

name: Elemental Specialization
description: You may choose one element (fire, frost, shock). Spells and effects of that element are 15% more powerful, while spells and effects of the other two elements are 15% weaker.

name: Exhaust
description: Frost spells and effects drain 50% more Stamina.

name: Show Them All
description: Shock spells and effects drain 50% more Magicka.

name: World in Flames
description: The burning ground created by Conflagration, Scorched Earth and Pyromancer Ascension deals 25% more damage. Additionally, other fire spells and effects are 25% more powerful against targets affected by burning ground.

name: Outburst
description: When you fall below 75 points of Health, the fiery energy within you explodes and ignites nearby enemies, dealing 30 points of fire damage per second for 4 seconds and applying fire spell perks. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

name: Stormblast
description: You accumulate static energy from the ambient air. Every 6-12 seconds in combat, your next shock spell triggers a ground discharge that radiates outward from the target. All enemies in the area take 60 points of shock damage to Health and Magicka.

name: Winter's Majesty
description: You radiate freezing cold, reducing the frost resistance of enemies within 25 feet by 50%. This penalty is applied on top of Shatter.

name: Absolute Power
description: Aiming a Sparks, Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Thunderbolt or Lightning Storm spell directly at a target will magnetically levitate them in front of you for 6 seconds, reducing magic resistance by 25%. This effect has a 45 second cooldown.

name: Cataclysm
description: Fire spells that hit targets affected by burning ground explode for 20% of their current Health (max. 250 damage), blasting them into the air and reducing magic resistance by 25% for 6 seconds. This effect has a 45 second cooldown.

name: Glacial Prison
description: Frost spells immobilize (non-essential) targets in a block of ice for 6 seconds, reducing magic resistance by 25%. This effect has a 120 second cooldown, but killing a victim affected by Glacial Prison or Hypothermia immediately ends the cooldown.

name: Enchanting Mastery 1
description: New enchantments are 20% stronger. Soul gems provide 2 extra weapon charge points per level of Enchanting.

name: Enchanting Mastery 2
description: New enchantments are 40% stronger. Soul gems provide 4 extra weapon charge points per level of Enchanting.

name: Last Word 1
description: Scrolls are 2% more powerful or last 4% longer per level of Enchanting.

name: Last Word 2
description: Scrolls are 4% more powerful or last 8% longer per level of Enchanting.

name: Last Word 3
description: Scrolls are 6% more powerful or last 12% longer per level of Enchanting.

name: Soul Siphon
description: Death blows with enchanted weapons to creatures, but not people, trap 5% of the victim's soul, recharging the weapon. Does not apply to staves.

name: Staff Channeler
description: When a staff is equipped, all weapon enchantments drain 25% less charge and you gain a small amount of Enchanting experience in combat.

name: Thunderstruck
description: Weapon enchantments are 25% more effective when delivered by a power attack (or 50% for a two-handed power attack).

name: Gem Dust
description: You may choose to destroy a Flawless Gem when you begin the enchanting process and sprinkle its dust on the Arcane Enchanter. New enchantments are 25% stronger when placed upon an item of the type corresponding to the gem.

name: Secretkeeper
description: When a staff is equipped in your left hand, your attacks deal 25% more damage and critical damage. When a staff is equipped in your right hand, your spells and scrolls are 25% more effective.

name: Spellscribe
description: Grants the 'Spellscribe' power: use it to store the spell you are dual casting. Your power attacks and power bashes unleash the stored spell for free, with a cooldown based on Enchanting skill. Only works with spells that affect other targets.

name: Flame of Magnus
description: While casting or concentrating on a staff in your left hand, you may attack with your right hand, dealing 50% more damage and critical damage.

name: Preserver
description: Learning an item's enchantment does not destroy it.

name: Might and Magic
description: You are adept at weaving blade and magic. Spells cast with your left hand are 10% more effective if you are wielding a weapon in your right hand. Attacks with a weapon in your right hand deal 10% more damage if you are holding a spell in your left hand.

name: Regalia
description: New enchantments placed upon robes, circlets, hoods and necklaces are 30% stronger.

name: Staff Recharge
description: Equipped staves regenerate 5 points of charge per second, up to their charge level when you last equipped them or recharged them with a soul gem.

name: Attunement
description: All enchantments on equipped weapons and armor are 10% more powerful and last 10% longer.

name: Charge Tap
description: Grants the 'Charge Tap' power. At will, drains a quarter of your current weapon charge to restore Health by 15% of the amount drained and Magicka and Stamina by 25% of the amount drained. (If you have two enchanted weapons equipped, the drain is split.)

name: Power Echoes
description: Spellscribe activates twice before going on cooldown.

name: Heart of the Sun
description: Use an equipped staff as an energy source, causing it to lose charge at a rate of 15 points per second but making your weapon enchantments 1% more effective per 50 points of charge remaining in the staff. (This effect stacks if more than one staff is equipped.) Sheathe to cancel.

name: Twin Enchantment
description: Can place two enchantments upon the same item.

name: Arcane Nexus
description: You may choose to upgrade one arcane enchanter to an Arcane Nexus for 2500 gold. New enchantments created at an Arcane Nexus are 25% stronger. Can be 'Disassembled' by sneaking, allowing you to upgrade another.

name: You Shall Not Pass
description: Simultaneously (within 1 second) using an enchanted staff in your left hand and striking with an enchanted weapon in your right hand releases a flash of light that staggers enemies and deals damage equal to half your Enchanting skill level.

name: Miracle
description: You put your heart and soul into the next item you enchant at an Arcane Nexus, placing up to three enchantments upon it that are 25% stronger. Try as you might, you will never be able to repeat this feat.

name: Heavy Armor Mastery 1
description: Armor rating of Heavy Armor increased by 20%. You gain a small amount of Heavy Armor experience when wearing at least two pieces of Heavy Armor in combat.

name: Heavy Armor Mastery 2
description: Armor rating of Heavy Armor increased by 40%. You gain a small amount of Heavy Armor experience when wearing at least two pieces of Heavy Armor in combat.

name: Cushioned 1
description: You take half damage from falling if wearing all Heavy Armor.

name: Cushioned 2
description: You take no damage from falling if wearing all Heavy Armor.

name: Battle Weary
description: Tired enemies have a harder time defeating your armor. You take up to 20% less attack damage from enemies with half or less Stamina, if wearing all Heavy Armor. The lower their Stamina, the less damage you take.

name: Heavy Armor Fit
description: Armor rating of Heavy Armor increased by 25% if wearing all Heavy Armor.

name: Defiance
description: You are trained to deflect incoming attacks while wearing all Heavy Armor. Whenever an enemy attacks you, you gain 15 points of armor rating for 10 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Face of Death
description: You no longer need to wear a helmet to benefit from perks that require 'wearing all Heavy Armor'. If you are not wearing a helmet, Heavy Armor pieces have 20% increased armor rating.

name: Rallying Standard
description: Grants the 'Rallying Standard' power. Once a day, place a banner that grants 150 points of armor and 25% melee damage to allies within 25 feet wearing all Heavy Armor (including you) and prevents them from fleeing. Lasts 60 seconds.

name: Born to Fight
description: Heavy Armor weighs half as much and slows you down half as much when worn.

name: Revel in Battle
description: Defiance also increases melee weapon damage by 3% for 10 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Bedrock
description: If wearing all Heavy Armor, you have 20% chance to brace for impact when attacked by an enemy, becoming immune to stagger for 4 seconds.

name: Break Upon Me
description: You are immune to basic melee weapon perks (Clash of Champions/Heroes, Denting/Crushing Blows, Bleed Like a Lamb/Dog, Bite Marks). If wearing all Heavy Armor, you take 10% less attack damage from enemies affected by one or more of these perks.

name: Never Kneel
description: If wearing all Heavy Armor, take 30% less attack damage from power attacks.

name: Lead the Tempest
description: Sprinting in combat increases the armor of allied people within 20 feet by 25% of your own armor, and the armor of allied Skeletons created by Bone Collector within 20 feet by 15% of your own armor. Lasts 30 seconds.

name: Reap the Whirlwind
description: When struck by a power attack or power bash, your attacks deal 125% more damage to the attacker for 5 seconds if wearing all Heavy Armor.

name: Out of the Inferno
description: Incoming fire, frost and shock damage reduced by 0.02% per point of armor if wearing all Heavy Armor.

name: Rise Above
description: If wearing all Heavy Armor, you intimidate enemies within 15 feet. They lose 5% attack damage and you gain 5% attack damage for each enemy affected.

name: Warbringer
description: Raising your hands (to draw a weapon or spell) places a Rallying Standard at your location for 120 seconds. This does not count against the limit of one Rallying Standard at a time.

name: Doombringer
description: Rallying Standard also improves Destruction spells and effects by 15%.

name: Immortal
description: If wearing all Heavy Armor, take 75% less damage from attacks below 15% Health (or 20% Health if you are affected by Rallying Standard).

name: Primal Fear
description: If wearing all Heavy Armor, walking (but not running) towards living enemies within 30 feet in front of you may break their confidence, causing them to flee for 8 seconds.

name: Sovereign
description: When struck by an attack, subsequent attacks are deflected if wearing all Heavy Armor. You take 75% reduced damage from attacks for 1 second.

name: Face of the Mountain
description: When struck by a power attack or power bash, the attacker's strike rebounds forcefully as if striking solid rock, staggering them and potentially knocking them to the ground if wearing all Heavy Armor.

name: Illusion Mastery 1
description: Illusion spells cost 35% less Magicka, Illusion spells last 0.5% longer per level of Illusion, and mind affecting Illusion spells (Calm, Fear, Frenzy, Rally) are 0.1 points stronger per level of Illusion.

name: Illusion Mastery 2
description: Illusion spells cost 50% less Magicka, Illusion spells last 1% longer per level of Illusion, and mind affecting Illusion spells (Calm, Fear, Frenzy, Rally) are 0.2 points stronger per level of Illusion.

name: Dream Thief
description: Activate sleeping victims to steal their dream, increasing the effectiveness of your Illusion spells by 50% for 3600 seconds. Chance to fail and alert the victim, based on Illusion skill.

name: Illusion Dual Casting
description: Dual casting an Illusion spell empowers it, increasing effectiveness and cost.

name: Commanding Presence
description: In combat, you radiate an aura of mystical nobility that touches allied creatures and people within 40 feet. Those affected gain 20% extra attack damage and have 20% chance of a critical strike.

name: Entice Barter
description: Activate any target under the effect of a Calm spell to initiate trade.

name: Imposing Presence
description: You radiate an aura of mystical charisma that touches all within 40 feet. Any Illusion spell you cast on those affected is 25% more powerful and lasts 30% longer.

name: Night Eye
description: Grants the 'Night Eye' power. At will, grants improved night vision for 120 seconds.

name: Crown of the False King
description: Commanding Presence also increases armor by 80 points and magic resistance by 20%.

name: Kindred Mage
description: Mind affecting spells and effects are 15 points stronger (or 30 points if you are the same race as the target).

name: Quiet Before the Storm 1
description: All spells you cast from any school of magic are silent to others.

name: Quiet Before the Storm 2
description: All spells you cast from any school of magic as well as all shouts, are silent to others.

name: Wilting
description: Those affected by a Calm spell or effect within the radius of Imposing Presence lose 200 points of armor and 50% magic resistance.

name: Fickle Fate
description: Mind affecting spells and effects cast on others are between 1 and 40 points stronger, chosen at random.

name: Nemesis
description: Activate any hostile creature or humanoid in combat to summon an illusion of the target with 1% extra attack damage per Illusion level. The illusion relentlessly attacks the target for 30 seconds. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

name: Terror
description: Those affected by a Fear spell or effect within the radius of Imposing Presence drop their weapon.

name: Imperious Splendor
description: Commanding Presence and Crown of the False King are twice as powerful as long as you remain above 75% Health.

name: Master of the Mind
description: Mind affecting spells (Calm, Fear, Frenzy, Rally) and Commanding Presence also work on undead, daedra and automatons.

name: Pandemonium
description: Those affected by a Frenzy spell or effect within the radius of Imposing Presence gain 50% extra attack damage.

name: Dream Charm
description: Activate sleeping victims to project yourself into their dream, improving their disposition towards you. High disposition may earn you quests, discounts and gifts. Chance to fail and alert the victim, based on Illusion skill.

name: Neverworld
description: Those affected by a Calm spell or effect within the radius of Imposing Presence are enraptured by a lotus dream from which they may refuse to return to reality. When the Calm is broken due to an attack, they may become Calmed again for 30 seconds.

name: Shadow Refuge
description: While affected by an invisibility spell or effect, you take 35% less damage from attacks and sneaking is 15% better.

name: The Reaper Comes
description: Activate any non-essential humanoid (only) under the effect of a Calm spell to send a wraith to slay the target within 15 seconds. This counts as an assault, if you get seen. This effect has a 180 second cooldown and can only affect one target at a time.

name: Lamb to the Slaughter
description: Activate any humanoid (only) under the effect of a Fear spell to compel the target to stand motionless for 30 seconds. Your attacks against this target ignore armor. This effect has a 180 second cooldown and can only affect one target at a time.

name: Protect Your God
description: When struck by a weapon, may compel a nearby ally affected by Commanding Presence to engage your attacker, dealing 250% extra attack damage for 5 seconds.

name: Soulcrusher
description: Feast upon the minds of those affected by a Fear spell or effect within the radius of Imposing Presence, absorbing 25 points of Magicka per second.

name: Blind Guardian
description: Activate any non-hostile creature or humanoid in combat to summon an illusion of the target. The illusion fights for the target for 60 seconds and the target won't flee for its duration. This effect has a 300 second cooldown.

name: Dream Geas
description: Activate sleeping victims to send a dream that compels them to fight at your side until released. You can only have one Dream Thrall at a time. Chance to fail and alert the victim, based on Illusion skill.

name: Ghost of the Tenth Eye
description: Sneaking while under the effect of the Vision of the Tenth Eye spell will summon a disembodied eye under your control. The eye has 1 point of Health, but is invisible and silent. You must know the Vision of the Tenth Eye spell to learn this perk.

name: Heavy Weighs the Tapestry
description: Activate any humanoid (only) under the effect of a Frenzy spell to incapacitate the target with magical exhaustion for 30 seconds and drain 500 points of Magicka and Stamina. This effect has a 180 second cooldown and can only affect one target at a time.

name: Nightfall
description: Those affected by a Frenzy spell or effect within the radius of Imposing Presence are consumed by battle hunger when there are no other enemies remaining, taking 40 points of damage per second.

name: Wraithwalker
description: After using an Activate perk (Blind Guardian, Heavy Weighs the Tapestry, Lamb to the Slaughter, Nemesis, The Reaper Comes), Illusion spells are 50% more powerful and last 50% longer for 10 seconds. The cooldown of Activate perks ends after 8 seconds out of combat.

name: Light Armor Mastery 1
description: Armor rating of Light Armor increased by 20%. You gain a small amount of Light Armor experience when wearing at least two pieces of Light Armor in combat.

name: Light Armor Mastery 2
description: Armor rating of Light Armor increased by 40%. You gain a small amount of Light Armor experience when wearing at least two pieces of Light Armor in combat.

name: Iron Fist 1
description: Increases unarmed damage by 5% of your current Stamina, and you gain Light Armor experience when using unarmed attacks in combat. Requires two free hands.

name: Iron Fist 2
description: Increases unarmed damage by 15% of your current Stamina, and you gain Light Armor experience when using unarmed attacks in combat. Requires two free hands.

name: Iron Fist 3
description: Increases unarmed damage by 25% of your current Stamina, and you gain Light Armor experience when using unarmed attacks in combat. Requires two free hands.

name: Annoying Mosquitoes 1
description: You take 10% less attack damage from enemies with full Health if wearing all Light Armor.

name: Annoying Mosquitoes 2
description: You take 20% less attack damage from enemies with full Health if wearing all Light Armor.

name: As a Leaf
description: While sprinting in Light Armor, you cannot be staggered and take 50% less damage from power attacks.

name: Light Armor Fit
description: Armor rating of Light Armor increased by 25% if wearing all Light Armor.

name: Initiative 1
description: When you enter combat, if wearing all Light Armor, regenerate up to 10% of your maximum Stamina per second. This bonus gradually diminishes over the course of 15 seconds.

name: Initiative 2
description: When you enter combat, if wearing all Light Armor, regenerate up to 20% of your maximum Stamina per second. This bonus gradually diminishes over the course of 15 seconds.

name: Keen Senses
description: You no longer need to wear a helmet to benefit from perks that require 'wearing all Light Armor'. If you are not wearing a helmet, Light Armor pieces have 20% increased armor rating.

name: Sweeping Wind
description: Unarmed power attacks do 25% more damage. Additionally, if your movement speed is increased, they do 2% damage per 1% movement speed. Requires two free hands.

name: Rushing Tide
description: Unarmed attacks grant 10% increased Stamina regeneration and 5% movement speed for 8 seconds. This effect stacks. Requires two free hands.

name: Unhindered
description: Light Armor weighs nothing and doesn't slow you down when worn.

name: Windrunner
description: Move 10% faster in combat if wearing all Light Armor.

name: Evasive Leap
description: If wearing all Light Armor, jump in combat to cause all incoming attacks and spells to miss for 1 second. This effect has a 5 second cooldown.

name: Into the Maelstrom
description: You take 10% less attack damage when fighting more than one enemy if wearing all Light Armor.

name: Fight or Flight
description: When struck by an unblocked attack or spell in combat, an adrenaline rush regenerates 5% of your maximum Stamina per second for 6 seconds if wearing all Light Armor.

name: Hissing Dragon
description: You may choose a damage type (fire, frost, shock, poison, disease or sun). Unarmed attacks unleash a shockwave that deals the chosen damage type to all targets in front of you. Requires two free hands. Does not activate while sneaking.

name: Wardancer
description: Your agility enables you to strike more effectively, granting 20% more attack damage and critical damage if wearing all Light Armor. This effect is lost for 6 seconds whenever you get struck by an unblocked attack or a hostile spell in combat.

name: Spelldancer
description: Wardancer also improves elemental (fire, frost and shock) spells and effects by the same amount.

name: Survival Instinct
description: When you get struck by an unblocked attack or hostile spell in combat, gain 10% movement speed for 6 seconds if wearing all Light Armor.

name: Wild and Free
description: While sprinting in Light Armor, you take 50% less damage from attacks.

name: Breaking Waves
description: Unarmed attacks have 15% chance of a critical strike that deals critical damage equal to 40% of your current Stamina. If you are affected by Wardancer, every hit is a critical strike. Requires two free hands.

name: Glancing Blows
description: You take 30% less damage from blocked attacks while Wardancer is active. When you lose the Wardancer effect due to an unblocked attack, it also deals 30% less damage.

name: Lightning Strike
description: Your critical strikes deal 75% more critical damage for 10 seconds after entering combat while wearing all Light Armor.

name: Tempting Fate
description: You gain 20% movement speed if you are not blocking during an enemy's power attack. If the power attack misses, the effect lasts until combat ends or until you get struck by a power attack.

name: Lockpicking Mastery 1
description: Weaker locks are easier to pick.

name: Lockpicking Mastery 2
description: All locks are easier to pick.

name: Bear Traps
description: Able to pick up Bear Traps or create them at a Forge or Anvil, and drop them from your inventory to place them. The teeth of placed Bear Traps deal 2 points of damage per level of Lockpicking. You can only pick up and carry two Bear Traps at a time.

name: Game of Fate
description: There are 5 Dragons of Fate hidden in random locked containers in Skyrim. Each grants 15000 gold and a free perk point when removed from its container. The name of the container changes to indicate the treasure inside.

name: Lockdown
description: Activate a hostile automaton to lockpick your way into its engine. Lock difficulty is based on its current Health. Pick its lock within 15 seconds to reduce its Health to 1 and shut it down for 60 seconds. If you fail, you can't try again for 30 seconds.

name: Robber's Eye
description: When you enter a dwelling you don't own, illuminates a locked container for 120 seconds. During this time, it contains valuable items (based on your Lockpicking skill and the difficulty of its lock). This can only occur once every 12-60 ingame hours.

name: Wax Key
description: Gives you a copy of a picked lock's key if it has one.

name: Gone in Fifteen Seconds
description: Taking 15 seconds or less to pick the lock on a container illuminated by Robber's Eye improves the added treasure by an average of 50% based on the level of the lock and resets the cooldown of Robber's Eye.

name: Lockjaw
description: Your Bear Traps stagger victims struck by the teeth, reducing their armor rating by 10 points per level of Lockpicking for 5 seconds.

name: Locksmith
description: Pick starts much closer to the lock opening position.

name: Big Game Hunter
description: Placed Bear Traps are 20% bigger and more likely to successfully hit small or fast moving targets. They also rearm themselves 2.5 seconds after being triggered.

name: Hotwire
description: Activate an automaton under Lockdown to lockpick its brain. Succeed within 15 seconds to hack the automaton, forcing it to follow you and fight for you. If you fail, you can't try again for 30 seconds. You can only have one Hotwired Automaton at a time.

name: Nose for Treasure
description: You may choose an item type (gold, jewelry, books, ingredients, potions, ingots, weapons, armor, scrolls). Containers illuminated by Robber's Eye are three times more likely to contain items of your chosen type over other types.

name: Dungeoneer
description: Robber's Eye also works in dungeons and lasts three times as long.

name: Golden Touch
description: Find 20-100 more gold in many dungeon chests and 2-10 more gold in some corpses, urns, etc.

name: Bait
description: Grants the 'Bait' power. At will, lures the nearest hostile target within 75 feet to the location of the nearest Bear Trap placed within 50 feet (not during combat or conversation). Lasts 30 seconds.

name: Bushwhack
description: If the victim of your Bear Trap is not detecting you, the trap is five times as effective.

name: The Revenge
description: You can pick up and carry 3 Bear Traps.

name: Percussive Maintenance
description: Your Hotwired Automaton moves 30% faster and attacks 20% faster. Hitting your Hotwired Automaton with a mace or warhammer repairs it 150 points (or 300 points on a power attack) and further increases attack speed by 50% for 10 seconds.

name: Treasure Hunter
description: Increases the chance of finding an additional weapon or armor item in many dungeon chests from 10% to 15%.

name: Dragon's Teeth
description: When placing a Bear Trap, you may choose to add an extra effect: Poison, Drain Magicka, Drain Stamina, Slow, Banish or Turn Undead. This effect is triggered when a victim is struck by the teeth and takes damage.

name: Seen This Before
description: Your skill at lockpicking is such that you may bypass locks of Expert or lower level without using a key or manually picking the lock. After picking or bypassing at least 100 locks, you gain 2 perk points.

name: One-Handed Mastery 1
description: One-handed weapons do 25% more damage./, and critical strikes with one-handed weapons do 2% more critical damage per level of One-Handed.

name: One-Handed Mastery 2
description: One-handed weapons do 50% more damage./, and critical strikes with one-handed weapons do 2% more critical damage per level of One-Handed.

name: Disciplined Fighter
description: Reduces the Stamina cost of power attacks with one-handed weapons by 15 points.

name: Bite Marks 1
description: Unblocked attacks with daggers deal an additional 1 point/s of bleed damage per second for 30 seconds to living targets. This effect stacks.

name: Bite Marks 2
description: Unblocked attacks with daggers deal an additional 2 point/s of bleed damage per second for 45 seconds to living targets. This effect stacks.

name: Bite Marks 3
description: Unblocked attacks with daggers deal an additional 3 point/s of bleed damage per second for 60 seconds to living targets. This effect stacks.

name: Bleed Like a Lamb 1
description: Attacks with war axes deal an additional 1 points of damage per second for 3 seconds to living targets. When the bleeding stops, they take damage equal to 15% of the Health they lost while bleeding.

name: Bleed Like a Lamb 2
description: Attacks with war axes deal an additional 2 points of damage per second for 3 seconds to living targets. When the bleeding stops, they take damage equal to 20% of the Health they lost while bleeding.

name: Bleed Like a Lamb 3
description: Attacks with war axes deal an additional 3 points of damage per second for 3 seconds to living targets. When the bleeding stops, they take damage equal to 25% of the Health they lost while bleeding.

name: Clash of Champions 1
description: Attacks with swords reduce the target's attack damage by 10% for 3 seconds.

name: Clash of Champions 2
description: Attacks with swords reduce the target's attack damage by 15% for 3 seconds.

name: Clash of Champions 3
description: Attacks with swords reduce the target's attack damage by 20% for 3 seconds.

name: Denting Blows 1
description: Attacks with maces reduce the armor rating of armored enemies by 50 points for 15 seconds.

name: Denting Blows 2
description: Attacks with maces reduce the armor rating of armored enemies by 75 points for 15 seconds.

name: Denting Blows 3
description: Attacks with maces reduce the armor rating of armored enemies by 100 points for 15 seconds.

name: Ravage 1
description: Dual wielding attacks are 20% faster.

name: Ravage 2
description: Dual wielding attacks are 35% faster.

name: Cross Cut 1
description: Unblocked regular attacks with a sword increase the damage of your power attacks against the target by 25% for 4 seconds.

name: Cross Cut 2
description: Unblocked regular attacks with a sword increase the damage of your power attacks against the target by 50% for 4 seconds.

name: Furious Strength
description: Power attack damage with one-handed weapons increased by 15% plus 0.1% per point of Stamina. Unlocks decapitations.

name: Mangle 1
description: Attacks with a war axe ignore 25% armor if the target is staggered.

name: Mangle 2
description: Attacks with a war axe ignore 50% armor if the target is staggered.

name: Savage 1
description: Attacks with a dagger deal 25% more damage if you rapidly hit the target three or more times. Resets when 2 seconds pass between hits.

name: Savage 2
description: Attacks with a dagger deal 50% more damage if you rapidly hit the target three or more times. Resets when 2 seconds pass between hits.

name: Smite 1
description: Power attacks with a mace deliver a critical strike that deals three times critical damage (four times against the undead). Targets can only be struck by Smite once every 30 seconds.

name: Smite 2
description: Power attacks with a mace deliver a critical strike that deals six times critical damage (eight times against the undead). Targets can only be struck by Smite once every 30 seconds.

name: Falling Sword
description: Forwards power attacks with a sword cause targets to bleed for 20 seconds. When a bleeding target falls below 25% Health, your attacks against that target are critical strikes that deals ten times critical damage.

name: Overrun
description: Can perform a one-handed sprinting power attack that deals up to 50% more damage and critical damage to a target above half Health. The higher its remaining Health percentage, the more damage and critical damage is dealt.

name: Rise Kinsmen
description: Forwards power attacks with a mace inspire nearby allies, granting them 20% extra attack damage for 15 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Rogue's Parry
description: When wielding a one-handed weapon and an empty other hand, attacking with the weapon while the opponent is winding up their attack or drawing a bow deals 40% more damage and delivers a critical strike.

name: Shieldbiter
description: Forwards power attacks with a war axe smash through a block, causing the target to drop their shield and take a critical strike that deals five times critical damage.

name: Twin Fang
description: Forwards power attacks with a dagger impale the target, dealing double Bite Marks damage, whether or not the attack is blocked.

name: Man O'War
description: While dual wielding in combat, build up a battle rage with each attack, gaining 1% extra attack damage and 1% bonus attack speed for 20 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Swaying Cobra
description: Sideways power attacks with a dagger inflict distracting wounds, draining 100 points of Magicka and Stamina and halting regeneration for 5 seconds.

name: Toll the Bell
description: Sideways power attacks with a mace deplete all of your Stamina on impact, dealing 1% more damage per point of Stamina depleted and doing a critical strike.

name: Windswept
description: Sideways power attacks with a sword fling targets backwards up to 6 feet, dealing up to 40% more damage based on distance traveled.

name: Wolfstooth
description: Sideways power attacks with a war axe grant 15% extra attack damage for 30 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Death Adder
description: Standing power attacks with a dagger ignore armor.

name: Go for the Throat
description: Standing power attacks with a war axe remove all active instances of Wolfstooth on the user, dealing 50% bonus damage and a critical strike for 250% bonus critical damage for each instance consumed.

name: Into the Dust
description: Repeated standing power attacks with a sword against a target do escalating damage if no more than 3 seconds pass between each. This effect stacks up to three times, each doing 15% more damage. Reaching four stacks knocks the target off their feet.

name: Meteor Storm
description: Each standing power attack with a mace that hits a target empowers subsequent standing power attacks with a mace within 20 seconds, increasing their damage and Stamina cost by 15%. This effect stacks.

name: Thundering Blow
description: Whenever you perform a total of 8 or more one-handed regular attacks in combat, your next one-handed power attack is a Thundering Blow that deals double damage and costs no Stamina, resetting the counter.

name: Apex Predator
description: Attacks with war axes deal bonus damage to living targets equal to 4% of their current Health (max. 40 damage).

name: Coiling Python
description: Hitting a target with a forwards, sideways and backwards power attack with a dagger within 30 seconds paralyzes the target for 20 seconds. Your attacks against the paralyzed target are critical strikes that deal nine times critical damage.

name: Judgment
description: Slaying an enemy under the effect of Clash of Champions restores 100 points of Stamina.

name: Skull Crack
description: Attacks with maces interrupt spellcasting. Does not work on massive targets.

name: Aftershock
description: After a Thundering Blow, attack speed is increased by 75% for 3 seconds.

name: Unleash the Beast
description: While dual wielding in combat, enter a murderous frenzy every 20 to 40 seconds. For 8 seconds, dual wield power attacks deal 50% more damage and 100% more critical damage.

name: Wandering Warrior
description: Whenever you defeat at least 4 humanoids and/or animals in a single battle, you gain a permanent +1% bonus to one-handed damage. This effect stacks up to +20%.

name: Pickpocket Mastery 1
description: Adds 20% to your pickpocket chance and increases carry weight by 50 points.

name: Pickpocket Mastery 2
description: Adds 40% to your pickpocket chance and increases carry weight by 100 points.

name: Blood Money
description: You find 10-100 more gold when looting humanoid corpses you have slain in an especially violent fashion (with an attack that dealt at least 100 more damage than their remaining Health or a killmove).

name: Trained Rabbit
description: Grants the 'Trained Rabbit' power. At will, silently sends out a trained rabbit to lead you to the nearest loose valuable item (armor, weapon, key, book, soul gem, ingredient). It then returns to you.

name: Cutpurse
description: Adds 25% to your chance to pickpocket gold, keys and jewelry.

name: Thief's Eye
description: When you enter a major city, illuminates a random citizen on the streets for 300 seconds. If you interact with the target during this time, they will carry valuable items (based on your Pickpocket skill). This can only occur once every 12-60 ingame hours.

name: Brotherhood Cocktail
description: Silently harm enemies by placing poisons in their pockets while pickpocketing.

name: Death's Emperor 1
description: A cursed septim appears in your inventory. When someone else is in possession of the coin, your attacks deal 100% more damage and critical damage to them.

name: Death's Emperor 2
description: A cursed septim appears in your inventory. When someone else is in possession of the coin, your attacks deal 200% more damage and critical damage to them.

name: On the Run
description: After you successfully pickpocket someone, sneaking is 200% more effective and movement speed is increased by 25% for 10 seconds.

name: Lawless World
description: Petty crimes are slowly forgotten, allowing your bounties for non-violent crimes to decay at a rate of 50% of your Pickpocket skill level each day.

name: Thief's Luck
description: You may choose an item type (gold, jewelry, books, ingredients, potions, ingots, scrolls). Those illuminated by Thief's Eye are three times more likely to carry items of your chosen type over other types.

name: Stalk the Prey
description: Preparing to pickpocket (sneaking behind a victim with the pickpocket message displayed) for at least 10 seconds adds 20% to your chance to pickpocket any item.

name: Doomed to Plunder
description: Killing a victim in possession of the Death's Emperor grants 100-300 more gold.

name: Trickster
description: Can pickpocket equipped weapons. If the target is sleeping, can pickpocket any equipped item.

name: Crime Wave
description: Shortly after you pickpocket or speak with the target illuminated by Thief's Eye, a new victim is illuminated, up to 4 times in a row.

name: You Saw Nothing
description: Grants the 'You Saw Nothing' power. Once a day, distract a target and others in a 40 foot radius around the target. For 45 seconds, you will not receive a bounty if they are the only witness of your crimes. Does not prevent them from defending themselves.

name: Mutiny
description: Grants the 'Mutiny' power. At will, activates the curse of the Death's Emperor, causing whoever is in possession of the coin to attack randomly for 30 seconds. Any deaths resulting from this can't be traced back to you.

name: Robbed Blind
description: Adds the Thief's Eye effect to You Saw Nothing.

name: Dragon Hoard
description: Whenever you sleep with 50000 or more gold in your inventory, you may choose to spend it to purchase a perk point.

name: Restoration Mastery 1
description: Cast Restoration spells for 35% less Magicka, and Restoration spells are 0.25% more powerful per level of Restoration.

name: Restoration Mastery 2
description: Cast Restoration spells for 50% less Magicka, and Restoration spells are 0.5% more powerful per level of Restoration.

name: Descending Light
description: When you enter combat, rapidly regenerate points of Magicka equal to half of your Restoration skill level per second. This effect gradually diminishes over the course of 15 seconds. The regeneration does not stop while casting.

name: Restoration Dual Casting
description: Dual casting a Restoration spell empowers it, increasing effectiveness and cost.

name: Edgewalker
description: Restoration spells are up to 30% more powerful if the recipient is below half Health. The bonus increases as Health decreases.

name: Hallowed Burial 1
description: Your attacks and Restoration spells and effects are 20% more powerful against undead enemies.

name: Hallowed Burial 2
description: Your attacks and Restoration spells and effects are 30% more powerful against undead enemies.

name: Spirit Tutors
description: Two spirit tutors roam Skyrim. Find them and speak with them to receive a permanent blessing that makes Restoration spells 1% stronger per 20 points of Magicka. Each spirit tutor grants one blessing.

name: Vigilant
description: The first ward you cast in combat costs no Magicka to maintain.

name: Necromanticon
description: Study the arts of disease, learning the 'Putrefy' spell. When your Restoration skill reaches 50, you learn 'Death Cloud'. When your Restoration skill reaches 75, you learn 'Carrion Wind'. These spells deal disease damage to nonmechanical targets.

name: Exorcist
description: Study the arts of destroying the undead, learning the 'Sunblast' spell. When your Restoration skill reaches 50, you learn 'Holy Hands'. When your Restoration skill reaches 75, you learn 'Stellar Core'. These spells deal damage to the undead.

name: False Light
description: While in combat, you may cast targeted healing spells and effects on enemies to inflict damage equal to 75% of the heal amount.

name: Respite
description: Healing spells also restore Stamina equal to their power.

name: Antimagic Field
description: Staying within 8 feet of an enemy while maintaining a ward prevents them from casting spells. No effect on massive targets.

name: Overflowing Cup
description: Receiving a healing spell or effect when you are already at full Health overheals you, fortifying Health by 1 point per level of Restoration for 20 seconds.

name: Pilgrim
description: Shrine blessings you receive are 1% stronger per level of Restoration.

name: Warrior's Flame
description: In combat, the Warrior's Flame periodically touches a random target within 100 feet (including you). Friendly targets are blessed, restoring 20 points of Magicka and Stamina for 5 seconds. Hostile targets are cursed, draining the same amount instead.

name: Ashes to Ashes
description: Your Warrior's Flame carries the essence of death. Hostile undead cursed by Warrior's Flame take 30 points of damage per second.

name: Crusader's Fire
description: In combat, targets within 30 feet affected by a Turn Undead spell or effect burn with divine fire, taking 10 points of damage per second for 10 seconds. Your attacks and critical strikes deal 25% more damage to targets affected by Crusader's Fire.

name: Forbidden Sanctuary
description: When your ward blocks a spell, you gain Magicka equal to 25% of that spell's cost (or 100% if you are blessed by Warrior's Flame).

name: Lightwielder
description: Increases False Light damage by 10% and allows the perks Sacred Guardian and Under my Wings to hit and damage enemies.

name: Sacred Flame
description: Your Warrior's Flame carries the essence of life. Living allies blessed by Warrior's Flame are healed 20 points per second.

name: Bastion Ward
description: Wards reduce incoming attack damage by 40% (or 20% for wards generated by Spellbreaker and Mage Ward).

name: Chalice of Tears
description: If you are diseased or undead, your Restoration spells are 15% stronger and last 50% longer.

name: Plague Doctor
description: Radiate a zone of pestilent death that reduces the poison and disease resistance of enemies approaching within 40 feet by 50% for 30 seconds.

name: Under my Wings
description: Dual casting a healing spell on yourself also casts it on nearby nonmechanical allies within 20 feet. Does not apply to concentration spells.

name: Wheel of Life
description: In combat, gradually accumulates ambient lifeforce from the environment and releases it in periodic bursts, healing you 100 points every 30 seconds. Becoming affected by a different healing spell or effect restarts the cycle from the beginning.

name: Battle Cleric
description: When Warrior's Flame blesses or curses a target, it also increases or reduces armor by 200 points and magic resistance by 25% for its duration.

name: In Thy Name
description: Increases False Light damage by 15% when you are affected by a shrine blessing.

name: Mage Ward
description: Casting a spell also raises a ward that increases armor rating by 100 and negates up to 100 points of spell damage and effects.

name: Sacred Guardian
description: Emanate a 20 foot aura of protection. Any living allies within range who fall below 30% Health are automatically healed 150 points. This effect has a 30 second cooldown per target.

name: Enduring Ideal
description: Wheel of Life heals 25% more and each new cycle is 5 seconds faster than the last.

name: Eternal Flame
description: Warrior's Flame lasts twice as long.

name: Gods and Mortals
description: Shrine blessings last 50% longer, and the blessings of the Divines (Akatosh, Arkay, Dibella, Julianos, Kynareth, Mara, Stendarr, Talos, Zenithar) confer powerful additional effects.

name: Tome of Many Pages
description: Teaches 18 different Restoration spells. Each fortifies a single skill by 15 levels for 120 seconds.

name: Apotheosis
description: Grants the 'Apotheosis' power. Once a day, casts Warrior's Flame on all nearby for 20 seconds. Costs 250 Magicka.

name: Smithing Mastery 1
description: You can create Novice (Steel) items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much./All items can be improved 10% more.

name: Smithing Mastery 2
description: You can create Novice (Bonemold) items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much./All items can be improved 10% more.

name: Dwarven Autocannon 1
description: You can create Dwemer Autocannons at a forge or anvil. Use the 'Dwarven Autocannon' power to deploy them. Cannons fire parallel to your crosshair for 30 seconds, dealing damage equal to 30% of your Smithing skill, if you are within 12 feet.

name: Dwarven Autocannon 2
description: You can create Dwemer Autocannons at a forge or anvil. Use the 'Dwarven Autocannon' power to deploy them. Cannons fire parallel to your crosshair for 60 seconds, dealing damage equal to 40% of your Smithing skill, if you are within 12 feet.

name: Advanced Workshop
description: You may choose to upgrade one grindstone or workbench to an Advanced version for 2500 gold. It improves items one tier higher (items can be improved beyond Legendary). Can be 'Disassembled' by sneaking, allowing you to upgrade another of the same type.

name: Meric Smithing 1
description: Choose an item type: Contemporary Meric (Elven), Dwarven. You can create items of the chosen type at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much. Investing a second perk point lets you choose both./You can create both Contemporary Meric (Elven) and Dwarven items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much.

name: Meric Smithing 2
description: Choose an item type: Contemporary Meric (Chitin), Dwarven. You can create items of the chosen type at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much. Investing a second perk point lets you choose both./You can create both Contemporary Meric (Chitin) and Dwarven items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much.

name: Arcane Blacksmith
description: You can improve enchanted weapons and armor.

name: Electrobolt 1
description: Every fifth Dwarven Autocannon shot is an electromagnetic blast that moves slower than a regular shell but deals shock damage to Health and Magicka equal to 80% of your Smithing skill level.

name: Electrobolt 2
description: Every fifth Dwarven Autocannon shot is an electromagnetic blast that moves slower than a regular shell but deals shock damage to Health and Magicka equal to 240% of your Smithing skill level.

name: Recycle Materials
description: 50% chance to retain any materials you spend at an Advanced Grindstone or Advanced Workbench.

name: Remote Control
description: Your Dwarven Autocannon now fires regardless of the distance between it and you.

name: Expert Smithing 1
description: Choose an item type: Hard Steel (Scaled/Plate), Orcish. You can create items of the chosen type at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much. Investing a second perk point lets you choose both./You can create both Hard Steel (Scaled/Plate) and Orcish items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much.

name: Expert Smithing 2
description: Choose an item type: Hard Steel (Nordic), Orcish. You can create items of the chosen type at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much. Investing a second perk point lets you choose both./You can create both Hard Steel (Nordic) and Orcish items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much.

name: Sandstone Sheath
description: When you draw a weapon, it is automatically sharpened, granting 25% extra attack damage for 10 seconds. This can only occur once every 30 seconds.

name: Smithing Specialization
description: You may choose an item type: One-Handed, Two-Handed, Light Armor, Heavy Armor or Archery. Items of the chosen type can be improved 20% better at a grindstone or workbench.

name: Exotic Smithing 1
description: Choose an item type: Glass, Crystalline (Ebony). You can create items of the chosen type at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much. Investing a second perk point lets you choose both./You can create both Glass and Crystalline (Ebony) items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much.

name: Exotic Smithing 2
description: Choose an item type: Glass, Crystalline (Stalhrim). You can create items of the chosen type at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much. Investing a second perk point lets you choose both./You can create both Glass and Crystalline (Stalhrim) items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much.

name: Firing Line
description: Your Dwarven Autocannon now deploys two cannons side by side.

name: Iron Lore
description: If you Specialized in an armor type, your attacks ignore 15% of the armor rating of enemies wearing items of the chosen type. If you Specialized in a weapon type, you take 10% less damage from weapons of the chosen type.

name: Spin Up
description: Your Dwarven Autocannon gradually shoots faster over time, gaining 2% firing speed per shot, up to 200%.

name: Planar Smithing 1
description: Choose an item type: Daedric. You can create items of the chosen type at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much. Investing a second perk point lets you choose both./You can create both Daedric and Dragonbone items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much.

name: Planar Smithing 2
