description: Choose an item type: Dragonbone. You can create items of the chosen type at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much. Investing a second perk point lets you choose both./You can create both Daedric and Dragonbone items at a forge or anvil, and improve them twice as much.

name: Fuel the Inferno
description: When activating an Advanced Grindstone or Advanced Workbench, you may choose to sacrifice a Dragon Soul to improve items by a further one tier during that session.

name: Heart of Creation
description: Pour your Dragonborn blood into the fire at one forge. Forging an item in this forge empowers you, increasing attack damage and critical strike damage by 15% and reducing attack damage taken by 15% for 1800 seconds.

name: Sneak Mastery 1
description: Sneaking is 15% more effective. Sneak success depends on visibility (movement and light level), sound (movement and armor weight), skill level and distance.

name: Sneak Mastery 2
description: Sneaking is 30% more effective. Sneak success depends on visibility (movement and light level), sound (movement and armor weight), skill level and distance.

name: Sneak Attack
description: Sneak attacks with one-handed weapons deal 100% more damage. Sneak attacks with any other weapon or fists deal 25% more damage.

name: Tripwire
description: Grants the 'Tripwire' power. At will, places a tripwire in front of you for 120 seconds. It snaps when tripped, knocking all targets hit by it to the floor.

name: Demolition Job
description: All Destruction spells and scrolls are 1% more powerful per level of Sneak if the target is not detecting the caster (2% for rune spells).

name: Fog of War
description: Sneaking is 15% more effective against targets that are in combat with you, or 30% if they are in combat with someone else.

name: Silent Roll
description: Sprinting while sneaking executes a silent forward roll.

name: Spot Detection
description: Grants the 'Spot Detection' power. At will, outlines all humanoids within 150 feet that are detecting you with a green glow. Lasts 30 seconds.

name: Assassin's Blade
description: Sneak attacks with daggers deal 1% more damage per level of Sneak.

name: Dynamic Entry
description: Performing a silent roll increases your weapon damage by 40% and unarmed damage by 40 points for 3 seconds.

name: Infiltrator
description: Your footsteps and equipped armor make 75% less noise when sneaking.

name: Whiplash
description: Tripwire also reduces armor rating by 1000 points for 5 seconds.

name: Backstab 1
description: You deal 25% more damage and critical damage with daggers when striking a target from behind.

name: Backstab 2
description: You deal 50% more damage and critical damage with daggers when striking a target from behind.

name: Light Foot
description: You won't trigger pressure plates.

name: Right Behind You
description: You are adept at hiding in your target's blind spot. Sneaking is 15% more effective within 30 feet and 30% more effective within 15 feet.

name: Disengage
description: Grants the 'Disengage' power. Once a day, all enemies within 100 feet who are attacking you or searching for you instantly stop and resume their normal activities.

name: Dodge Roll
description: Performing a silent roll makes you ethereal for 1 second, causing all incoming attacks and spells to miss.

name: Smokescreen
description: Grants the 'Smokescreen' power. Once a day, creates a 35 foot cloud for 180 seconds that blinds those in the cloud, preventing them from seeing sneaking targets. Sneak attacks against them deal 50% more damage.

name: Backup Plan
description: After being out of combat for at least 5 seconds, entering combat will place a Tripwire behind you for 60 seconds. This does not count against the limit of one Tripwire at a time.

name: Clean Escape
description: When you stand still for 8 seconds while sneaking, enemies within 150 feet no longer search for you.

name: Behind Enemy Lines
description: Sneaking is 15% more effective for each enemy within 100 feet that is not detecting you.

name: Partystarter
description: When you gain invisibility, places a barrel of flammable booze at your location. When you lose invisibility, it explodes, dealing fire damage equal to 200% of your Sneak skill level and staggering targets. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

name: Problem Solver
description: Sneak attacks deal 10% more damage for each 200 points of Health the target has, up to 50% more damage.

name: Cloak and Dagger
description: Breaking invisibility with a power attack is a guaranteed critical strike that deals 50% more critical damage.

name: Greased Lightning
description: A hidden bottle enables you to leave a trail of grease whenever you perform a silent roll in combat. The grease lasts for 10 seconds and staggers running enemies, while sprinting enemies slip and fall to the ground.

name: Shadow Warrior
description: Entering sneak mode in combat grants 2 seconds of invisibility, briefly leaving combat and forcing distant opponents to search for you. This effect has an 8 second cooldown.

name: Laughing Ghost
description: Grants the 'Laughing Ghost' power. At will, while sneaking, teleport through the shadows behind a target to attempt a sneak power attack with your right weapon that deals double sneak attack damage. The target must be out of combat.

name: Speech Mastery 1
description: Sell items for 10% more. Your intimidation attempts are twice times as likely to succeed.

name: Speech Mastery 2
description: Sell items for 20% more. Your intimidation attempts are four times as likely to succeed.

name: And the Universe Listens
description: Shouting restores points of Health, Magicka and Stamina equal to your shout cooldown in seconds. You gain Speech experience when shouting based on your shout cooldown.

name: Performer
description: Grants the 'Perform' power. Once a day, play a song to entertain up to five people within 50 feet and collect a donation from each, based on your Speech skill and the amount of gold they are carrying.

name: Bribery
description: Can bribe guards to ignore crimes.

name: Kinship
description: Buy items for 15% less when trading with the same race.

name: Irresistible Dance
description: Can Perform in combat to force the two nearest enemy people within 100 feet to dance spellbound, preventing them from acting and reducing their armor skills by 50 levels. Use again to stop.

name: Serenade
description: Performing to members of the opposite sex yields twice as much gold and potentially small items.

name: Business Relation
description: Create a bond with the next merchant you speak with. Buy items for 30% less from that specific merchant.

name: Encore
description: Able to Perform multiple times per day.

name: Golden Fiddle
description: Irresistible Dance now also forces daedra, undead and animals to listen spellbound.

name: Windborne
description: Shouting summons up a divine wind, granting 30% extra attack damage and 15% increased movement speed for 15 seconds. This effect stacks.

name: Force Redoubled 1
description: 25% chance to reduce the cooldown of any shout to 3 seconds.

name: Force Redoubled 2
description: 50% chance to reduce the cooldown of any shout to 3 seconds.

name: Salesman
description: Can sell any type of item to any kind of merchant.

name: Speak with Animals
description: Can Activate animals to tame them, forcing them to follow you anywhere you go and fight for you until released. You can only have one Wild Companion at a time. Use the 'Release Companion' power to release your Wild Companion.

name: Earthquake Drum
description: Can Perform in combat to unleash shockwaves. Each drumbeat deals 50 points of damage to nearby enemies within 30 feet. Use again to stop.

name: Hurricane Force
description: Shouts that affect others are 1% more powerful per level of Speech.

name: Investor
description: Can invest 500 gold with a shopkeeper to increase his or her available gold by 500 permanently.

name: Fence
description: Can barter stolen goods with any merchant.

name: Horn of Sovngarde 1
description: Grants the 'Horn of Sovngarde' power. Once a day, blow a horn to call the nearest three friendly people (except followers) within 200 feet to follow you for 600 seconds/one ingame day.

name: Horn of Sovngarde 2
description: Grants the 'Horn of Sovngarde' power. Once a day, blow a horn to call the nearest three friendly people (except followers) within 200 feet to follow you for 600 seconds/one ingame day.

name: Thu'um of War
description: Your shouts stagger nearby enemies within 25 feet, reducing armor rating by 300 points for 10 seconds and knocking enemies below 25% Health to the ground.

name: Gift of Kynareth
description: Improves your Wild Companion. Wolves gain 100% extra attack damage. Spiders gain magic immunity. Bears gain 150 points of Health. Chaurus gain 300 points of armor. Saber cats gain 40% movement speed and move silently.

name: Merciless Storm
description: Grants the 'Merciless Storm' power. Once a day, cancels an active shout cooldown, allowing you to shout again immediately afterwards.

name: Witching Rhythm
description: Earthquake Drum deals 50% more damage. Each beat of Earthquake Drum also briefly reduces the magic resistance of affected enemies by 200% for 0.4 seconds.

name: Lord of the Dance
description: Irresistible Dance can affect up to five enemies.

name: War Drummer
description: Each beat of Earthquake Drum also heals nearby allies by up to 20 points based on their missing Health percentage, and grants them 100% extra attack damage for 0.4 seconds.

name: Trade Prince
description: Every merchant in the world gains 1000 gold for bartering.

name: Dovahzulaan
description: For 120 seconds after using Merciless Storm, any shout you use also carries the previous shout.

name: Two-Handed Mastery 1
description: Two-handed weapons do 25% more damage./, and critical strikes with two-handed weapons do 2% more critical damage per level of Two-Handed.

name: Two-Handed Mastery 2
description: Two-handed weapons do 50% more damage./, and critical strikes with two-handed weapons do 2% more critical damage per level of Two-Handed.

name: Trained Fighter
description: Reduces the Stamina cost of power attacks with two-handed weapons by 20 points.

name: Bleed Like a Dog 1
description: Attacks with battle axes deal an additional 2 points of damage per second for 3 seconds to living targets. When the bleeding stops, they take damage equal to 20% of the Health they lost while bleeding.

name: Bleed Like a Dog 2
description: Attacks with battle axes deal an additional 3 points of damage per second for 3 seconds to living targets. When the bleeding stops, they take damage equal to 25% of the Health they lost while bleeding.

name: Bleed Like a Dog 3
description: Attacks with battle axes deal an additional 4 points of damage per second for 3 seconds to living targets. When the bleeding stops, they take damage equal to 30% of the Health they lost while bleeding.

name: Clash of Heroes 1
description: Attacks with greatswords reduce the target's attack damage by 15% for 3 seconds.

name: Clash of Heroes 2
description: Attacks with greatswords reduce the target's attack damage by 20% for 3 seconds.

name: Clash of Heroes 3
description: Attacks with greatswords reduce the target's attack damage by 25% for 3 seconds.

name: Crushing Blows 1
description: Attacks with warhammers reduce the armor rating of armored enemies by 75 points for 15 seconds.

name: Crushing Blows 2
description: Attacks with warhammers reduce the armor rating of armored enemies by 100 points for 15 seconds.

name: Crushing Blows 3
description: Attacks with warhammers reduce the armor rating of armored enemies by 125 points for 15 seconds.

name: Batter 1
description: Power attacks with a warhammer have 15% chance of a critical strike. All critical strikes with a warhammer deal double critical damage.

name: Batter 2
description: Power attacks with a warhammer have 25% chance of a critical strike. All critical strikes with a warhammer deal double critical damage.

name: Ferocious Strength
description: Power attack damage with two-handed weapons increased by 15% plus 0.1% per point of Stamina. Unlocks decapitations.

name: Maul 1
description: Power attacks with a greatsword destabilize a target, increasing the damage of your regular attacks against the target by 25% for 5 seconds.

name: Maul 2
description: Power attacks with a greatsword destabilize a target, increasing the damage of your regular attacks against the target by 50% for 5 seconds.

name: Rive 1
description: Power attacks with a battle axe ignore 25% armor.

name: Rive 2
description: Power attacks with a battle axe ignore 50% armor.

name: Avalanche
description: Forwards power attacks with a warhammer daze a target for 10 seconds, causing the target to stagger when struck by any unblocked attack.

name: Breach the Wall
description: Forwards power attacks with a greatsword that would leave the target above 60% Health deal enough additional damage to make up the difference.

name: Execute
description: Forwards power attacks with a battle axe execute targets below 30% Health, delivering a critical strike that deals twenty times critical damage.

name: Trample
description: Can perform a two-handed sprinting power attack that deals up to 50% more damage and critical damage to a target above half Health. The higher its remaining Health percentage, the more damage and critical damage is dealt.

name: Death or Glory
description: Two-handed power attacks deal up to 100% more damage below half Health. The damage bonus increases as your Health decreases.

name: Decimate
description: Sideways power attacks with a battle axe hit all targets in front of you. This deals 20% more damage for each enemy within 8 feet.

name: Subjugate
description: Sideways power attacks with a greatsword hit all targets in front of you, lowering attack speed to 50% for 10 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown per target.

name: The Pendulum
description: Sideways power attacks with a warhammer hit all targets in front of you. When this hits a target twice within 10 seconds, the second hit knocks the target to the ground, dealing 50% more damage and a critical strike that does double critical damage.

name: Bisect
description: Standing power attacks with a battleaxe deal bonus damage equal to 15% of a target's current Health (max. 150 damage).

name: Grand Slam
description: Whenever a standing power attack with a warhammer inflicts a critical strike, it deals 3% more critical damage per point of Stamina.

name: Humiliate
description: Standing power attacks with a greatsword fatigue a target, draining 150 points of Magicka and Stamina and halting regeneration for 5 seconds.

name: Massacre
description: In combat, swinging a two-handed weapon has 10% chance to increase attack speed by 175% for 3 seconds.

name: Deadfall
description: Bashing with a warhammer to interrupt an attack before it hits allows you to follow up with a power attack within 2 seconds to crush the attacker, reducing their armor by 500 points for 5 seconds.

name: Overthrow
description: Bashing with a greatsword to interrupt an attack before it hits allows you to follow up with a power attack within 2 seconds to deliver a critical strike that deals three times critical damage and disarms them.

name: Ram's Head
description: Bashing with a battle axe to interrupt an attack before it hits allows you to follow up with a power attack within 2 seconds to knock them to the ground.

name: Wolfkin
description: After performing 2 or more consecutive two-handed power attacks in combat, your next two-handed regular attack manifests a Spirit Wolf for 30 seconds that deals 15 bonus damage for each power attack.

name: Bear Hide
description: You take half damage from enemy attacks while power attacking with a two-handed weapon.

name: Enter the Arena
description: Massacre always activates when you take your first two-handed swing in combat. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

name: Voice of Rage and Ruin
description: In combat, swinging a two-handed weapon has 4% chance to activate your currently equipped power.

name: Slayer of a Thousand Sons
description: In combat, two-handed weapons deal 5% more damage for each humanoid or animal you have slain in the previous battle, up to 40%.
